item.title: free monads in business application
item.description: What This post describes Letter Shop API implementation which uses Free Monads, exactly Free from Cats tl;dr show me the code Why There are some nice materials about free monads on the net, but I always wanted to see how such concepts, applied to regular business applications, look like. How difficult or cumbersome it is to implement some business use case using a particular concept, e.
